title: 2016 Easter event

properties.name: description
properties.value: In the 2016 Easter event, players must help the Easter Bunny in clearing out his factory of a certain Chocolate Chicken, who destroyed the eggs and the presents within them.

content:
The Easter Bunny's Workshop
Released 17 March 2016 (Update)
End date 31 March 2016 (Update)
Reward See below
Emote Rabbit Hop
Preceded by 2015 Easter event
Succeeded by 2017 Easter event

In the 2016 Easter event, players must help the Easter Bunny in clearing out his factory of a certain Chocolate Chicken, who destroyed the eggs and the presents within them.

A player can start this event south of Falador's southern entrance. The holiday event icon displays the location of the event on the world map and minimap.

Location on the world map.

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Head to the southern entrance of Falador, directly north of the Air Altar, and speak to the Easter Bunny. He will explain that while preparing to produce this year's chocolate eggs, he was visited by a travelling merchant who persuaded him to buy a potion that would make the chocolate taste better. However immediately after he added it to the mixture it began to bubble and an evil Chocolate Chicken came out of it, destroying the eggs and the presents within them.

He further notes that the presents have given the chocolate chicken the ability to teleport away from those who attempt to catch it. Players must find a way to startle the chicken into relinquishing all the presents.

Shoving crates to lure the chicken.

Enter the burrow. In the factory, there are several piles of crates that can be shoved or pushed. Find one where the Chocolate Chicken is hiding, and shove the crates. It will escape and drop a Chocolate egg, which when broken will contain teleport cards. Keep searching for the Chocolate Chicken and shove the crates whenever it is hiding behind them.

Melting a large chocolate egg.
Breaking a crate of eggs.

It may also hide within moving crates of eggs. Take a hammer from the floor and break the crate, as the Chocolate Chicken is hiding inside it. It can also hide within large easter eggs; players must melt them with a tinderbox, which can also be found on the factory floor.

Possible locations of evil chocolate chicken:

  • south-west corner: drop crates on it
  • close (but not at) northern part of room, in the middle (in terms of west-east): drop crates on it.
  • north-east corner: drop crates on it, make sure to move crates to reveal chocolate egg left behind
  • next to glass elevator: use tinderbox on large egg
  • west of room: use tinderbox on large egg
  • north-west corner: use hammer on crate
  • don't remember other location: use hammer on crate

After chasing it eight times (making sure to crack open the chocolate egg that is left behind each time the evil chocolate chicken teleports away; if dropping crates on top of the Evil Chicken in the north-east corner, push the crates to be able to grab the chocolate egg. Getting additional chocolate eggs beyond eight is possible, but will result in no prize when cracked open, whereas the first eight chocolate eggs will give a teleport card when cracked open), players will be given the option to finish the Chocolate Chicken. They will punch the chicken, shattering it to delicious pieces, leaving a Chronicle on the ground, which can be used to teleport outside the Champions' Guild, providing that teleport cards are used on it.

Exit by using the glass elevator, and speak to the Easter Bunny to inform him of your success. Event complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

After completing this event players will receive:

  • Bunny top
  • Bunny legs
  • Bunny paws
  • Other rewards from previous events, which are obtained from Diango instead:
    • Rabbit Hop emote
    • Bunny ears
    • Rubber chicken
    • Easter ring
    • Chicken outfit
    • Easter basket
    • Bunny feet
    • Two noted easter eggs

In the '''2016 Easter event''', players must help the [[Easter Bunny]] in clearing out his factory of a certain Chocolate Chicken, who destroyed the eggs and the presents within them.

A player can start this event south of [[Falador]]'s southern entrance. The holiday event [[icon]] [[File:Holiday event icon.png]] displays the location of the event on the [[world map]] and [[minimap]].
[[File:Easter Bunny location (2016-2017).png|thumb|left|250px|Location on the world map.]]
{{Clear|left}}
==Walkthrough==
[[File:Easter Bunny chathead.png|left]]
Head to the southern entrance of [[Falador]], directly north of the [[Air Altar]], and speak to the [[Easter Bunny]]. He will explain that while preparing to produce this year's chocolate eggs, he was visited by a travelling merchant who persuaded him to buy a potion that would make the chocolate taste better. However immediately after he added it to the mixture it began to bubble and an evil [[Chocolate Chicken]] came out of it, destroying the eggs and the presents within them.

He further notes that the presents have given the chocolate chicken the ability to teleport away from those who attempt to catch it. Players must find a way to startle the chicken into relinquishing all the presents.
[[File:Easter_2016_-_Shoving_crates.png|thumb|left|Shoving crates to lure the chicken.]]
Enter the burrow. In the factory, there are several piles of crates that can be shoved or pushed. Find one where the [[Chocolate Chicken]] is hiding, and shove the crates. It will escape and drop a [[Chocolate egg]], which when broken will contain [[teleport card]]s. Keep searching for the Chocolate Chicken and shove the crates whenever it is hiding behind them.[[File:Easter_2016_-_Melting_eggs.png|thumb|left|Melting a large chocolate egg.]]
[[File:Easter_2016_-_Breaking_crates.png|thumb|210px|Breaking a crate of eggs.]]
It may also hide within moving crates of eggs. Take a [[hammer]] from the floor and break the crate, as the Chocolate Chicken is hiding inside it. It can also hide within large easter eggs; players must melt them with a tinderbox, which can also be found on the factory floor.

Possible locations of evil chocolate chicken:
*south-west corner: drop crates on it
*close (but not at) northern part of room, in the middle (in terms of west-east): drop crates on it.
*north-east corner: drop crates on it, make sure to move crates to reveal chocolate egg left behind
*next to glass elevator: use '''tinderbox''' on large egg
*west of room: use '''tinderbox''' on large egg
*north-west corner: use '''hammer''' on crate
*don't remember other location: use '''hammer''' on crate
After chasing it eight times '''(making sure to crack open the chocolate egg that is left behind each time the evil chocolate chicken teleports away; if dropping crates on top of the Evil Chicken in the north-east corner, push the crates to be able to grab the chocolate egg. Getting additional chocolate eggs beyond eight is possible, but will result in no prize when cracked open, whereas the first eight chocolate eggs will give a teleport card when cracked open)''', players will be given the option to finish the Chocolate Chicken. They will punch the chicken, shattering it to delicious pieces, leaving a [[Chronicle]] on the ground, which can be used to teleport outside the [[Champions' Guild]], providing that [[teleport card]]s are used on it.

Exit by using the glass elevator, and speak to the Easter Bunny to inform him of your success. Event complete!

==Rewards==
After completing this event players will receive:
*[[Bunny top]]
*[[Bunny legs]]
*[[Bunny paws]]
*Other rewards from previous events, which are obtained from [[Diango]] instead:
**[[Rabbit Hop]] emote
**[[Bunny ears]]
**[[Rubber chicken]]
**[[Easter ring]]
**[[Chicken outfit]]
**[[Easter basket]]
**[[Bunny feet]]
**Two noted [[easter egg]]s
